tags: Publication of the notification and submission of an application
Fulfillment, termination, modification of the contract

cards.title: The IMP justification services
cards.text: A complex of services to simplify the process of calculating the initial maximum price (Order of the Ministry of Economic Development of the Russian Federation No. 567, Order of the Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation No. 1064n, Order of the Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation No. 450n)

cards.title: Verification of compliance with government standards
cards.text: This functionality checks the relevance of the government standards specified in the documentation (GOST, SNiP, SanPiN, RD)

cards.title: Search for documentation
cards.text: The service helps to quickly find purchase documentation for further use during carrying out procedures. The search is performed among documents from notifications published in the UIS

cards.title: Check for restrictions, prohibitions and benefits
cards.text: The functionality allows to quickly pick up OKPD2 / KTRU codes by the desired object of purchase and characteristics, as well as check them for benefits, prohibitions and restrictions and find standard contracts

cards.title: Calculation of time frames of procedures
cards.text: A simple and intuitive calculator to create time frames for purchases under 44-FZ taking into account the latest legislative changes

cards.title: Attraction of suppliers
cards.text: Increasing competition and the number of participants of procurement procedures through direct calling by marketing center specialists of the Federal Platform TEK-Torg. To use this service, you need to contact the personal manager

cards.title: Automatic verification of procurement documentation
cards.text: The documentation of each notification published in the Government Procurement section on the Federal Platform TEK-Torg is automatically checked for outdated or replaced government standards and norms

cards.title: Supplier selection service
cards.text: The service generates a list of suppliers, contractors, performers in accordance with the desired object of purchase, indicating contacts for further interaction

cards.title: Report on verifications of procurement participants
cards.text: At one click of a button, the platform checks all procurement participants in the registers (the Blacklist of Suppliers, SME Register, SRO, 19.28 of the Administrative Code, bankruptcy)

cards.title: Verification of the counterparty
cards.text: The functionality of comprehensive verification of counterparties allows to get acquainted with detailed information about company, view financial statements, learn the history of contract execution and of the counterparty's participation in purchases, and check them for affiliation

cards.title: Recognition of application documents
cards.text: The platform recognizes a number of documents (Certificate of Compliance (RU), Certificate of Origin (ST-1), Licenses, extracts from the register of licenses) as part of the application for participation in procurement for healthcare needs and displays their details in a convenient report, as well as provides links to the relevant registers for subsequent verification

cards.title: Informing about the method of securing the application
cards.text: At the stage of applications review, the participant that provided the application with a bank guarantee is highlighted in a separate color (for subsequent verification)

cards.title: Deferred publication of protocols
cards.text: The ability to postpone sending an electronically signed protocol to the UIS for subsequent adjustments

cards.title: Notifications in Telegram
cards.text: The platform provides the possibility of flexible setting of notifications sent to e-mail and Telegram messenger

cards.title: Control module for time frames of procurement procedures
cards.text: Control over time frames of the procurement stages is implemented not only through a general list of all procedures, but also through a separate section “Do not forget” that displays only the necessary information about the actions that the customer shall perform on current purchases

cards.title: Automatic calculation of the contract price on the basis of preferences
cards.text: The platform automatically calculates the amount of the contract to be concluded taking into account the applied preferences and displays this information in the protocol

cards.title: Chat with the winner of the procurement procedure
cards.text: Implemented the ability to create chats with the procurement participant recognized as the winner based on the results of review of applications. Besides, it is possible to share files via chat

cards.title: Coordination of the anti-dumping measures application with the Authorized Body
cards.text: The platform makes it possible to send for approval to an Authorized institution/body a request for the application of anti-dumping measures

cards.title: Conclusion of additional agreements through the functionality of the platform
cards.text: The platform provides the ability of concluding additional agreements to the contract in electronic form

cards.title: Control module of stages and payments under the contract
cards.text: A section containing information on contracts to monitor stages and payments

cards.title: Preparation of the SMP report
cards.text: The service allows to quickly and easily generate a report on the volume of purchases from small businesses

cards.title: Procurement register
cards.text: The register contains information on published procedures for preparation of regular analytical reports

cards.title: Generation of detailed analytical reports on all purchases of the authorized bodies/the Customer
cards.text: The ability to generate detailed analytical reports on all purchases based on more than 300 criteria and indicators with graphical visualization and the possibility of comparative analysis
